backlog.description: Validate survey weights and replicate design metadata against data files.
Produce exploratory weighted summaries for key wellbeing and socioeconomic outcomes.
Request official survey design weights or documentation from data provider.
Analyze missingness drivers for self-love and abuse items; plan imputation strategy.
Prototype multiple imputation workflow for self-love and abuse items (seed 20251016).
Review imputed vs complete-case summaries and design robustness checks.

next_actions.description: Coordinate sending of survey weight request; track provider response.
Review imputed distributions and finalize robustness checks for PAP.

notes: Drafted survey weight request template and completed missingness diagnostics; logit models indicate age/education association with self-love non-response and higher missingness among higher childhood class / male-at-birth for abuse item. MICE plan documented, awaiting weight metadata before confirmatory work. Completed prototype MICE workflow (20 imputations, seed 20251016) with small-cell suppression; dropped-all-missing Religionchildhood and mentalillness for follow-up coding review.
regeneration_command: python analysis/code/eda_weighted_summaries.py && python analysis/code/missingness_analysis.py && python analysis/code/mice_prototype.py --dataset childhoodbalancedpublic_original.csv --config config/agent_config.yaml --seed 20251016 --n-imputations 20 --burn-in 10
